verse: नाथेतिश्रुतयो न तत्त्वमतयो घोषस्थिता गोपिका जारिण्यः कुलजातिधर्मविमुखाअध्यात्मभावं ययुः । भक्तिर्यस्य ददाति मुक्तिमतुलां जारस्य यः सद्गति ह्यर्ति त्राणपरायणः स भगवान्नारायणो मे गतिः ॥

words_meaning.कुलजातिधर्मविमुखाः: opposed to family duties and caste customs

overall_meaning: The Gopikas, stationed at the gate, not recognized by the scriptures or philosophers, with a spiritual attitude and opposed to family duties and caste customs, attained a devotion that gives liberation beyond compare. Those women, whose auspicious destination is the divine Narayana, dedicated to relieving distress, are my refuge.
